name: Ext_R4_MedicinalProductIndication
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.MedicinalProductIndication for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicinalProductIndication from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicinalProductIndication|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.
